name: Cumberland Valley Aging & Disability Resource Center
description: The Cumberland Valley Area Development District serves as the Area Agency on Aging and Independent Living, providing comprehensive services for older adults age 60 and older. Services include information and access, case management, assessment, community-based services, and elder rights. Programs include Family Caregiver Support, Homecare Services, Legal Services, Ombudsman Program, Participant Directed Services, Senior Centers, Senior Community Service Employment, and State Health Insurance Assistance Program (SHIP).
source: Verified from official CVADD website and Kentucky government sources
eligibility_requirements: Services available for individuals age 60 and older
populations_served: Older adults, seniors, individuals with disabilities, caregivers
cost_information: Services provided at no cost or on a sliding scale basis
languages_available: English, translation services available upon request
